name: Epistory - Typing Chronicles
summary:
Epistory - Typing Chronicles is a beautiful atmospheric 3D action/adventure typing game that tells the story of a writer lacking inspiration who asks her muse to help write her latest book.

It features a visually stunning papercraft art style and blends light RPG elements with exploration and unique combat mechanics solely using the keyboard.
